sentences.sContent: Her gaze sharpened, as if she had seen something unusual.
sentences.sCn: 她眼睛一亮，好像看到了不寻常的东西。

sentences.sContent: He will need to sharpen his diplomatic skills in order to work with Congress.
sentences.sCn: 他将需要增强外交技巧以与国会打交道。
